overview: Recorded in July 2006, ‘The Hidden Agenda’, is a remarkably prescient presentation. Ian R Crane explores the occult belief systems of those who believe that they are the rightful rulers of a global fiefdom … and presents the evidence which might explain why they are running scared from a forthcoming event, as foretold in ancient texts. An event which they fear might relieve them of their planetary command … !
title: The Hidden Agenda
